item.title: The First Track
item.description: I recently published my first track, Dwarven Future, and I have an awful lot to say about it. Getting Into Music This has been a long time coming, and a journey that started almost 2 years ago. I began with a Yamaha Reface CS and later an Arturia Drum Brute Impact. Since then, I’ve slowly built up a collection of equipment to make music entirely on my own. Doing it Blind This was the single largest barrier to getting into music production.
